name: Hairball Heist
description:
Your party of criminal cats goes on a hazardous heist for some tasty treats. The guard notices you landing on the hardwood floor and you get caught! Fortunately you left a bunch of hair for a soft landing for the rest of your party members. They'll get the treats and break you out of cat jail!

Our first game jam game! Please play in full screen mode in 1080p 👉👈

Edit: We forgot to add music to the levels after level 1. Please relax and give it a listen in level 1!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to aim
  • Space to jump
  • Mouse to select the cats
